column4: Hey guys I'm in a lot of trouble here, my USB drives and CDrom don't work, at first my USB keyboard & mouse didn't either but I fixed them in Xorg.  I think it might be related to this error after I upgraded Kubuntu Karmic: hald[1108]: segfault at 0 ip 0000000000410e70 sp 00007fff4b74b470 error 4 in hald[400000+56000]
that looks like a sever bug. file it at launchpad.org provide your kernel, lshw, lspci, and related package versions
i want to but where do i go on launchpad
i know the site, where do i go IN it?
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ you have to login/create account to be able to file bugs
yeah I got that, I know the site, I just don't see the link "file a bug report" or anything
report a bug in the upper right corner
ok I dont have that can you give me a direct url?
that link is there only if u login
come on I know i have to log in
i think it'll be appropriate place for hal segfaulting bug
ah ok that's better thanks.. .firs ttime i file bug for launchpad
